summary: Amazon Kindle is a popular line of e-readers. These devices let you read digital books, newspapers, and magazines. You can buy and download content from the Kindle Store. The first Kindle was released in 2007, and now there are many different models. They have different types of screens, like E Ink, and you can use Kindle apps on computers and phones too. As of 2018, the Kindle Store has millions of e-books to choose from.
title: Amazon Kindle
